English.Text: A few heads turn, but the doormen don't stop you. "I'm a special guest of the Piedmont family," you say with a winning smile, as you brandish the invitation Prince Ernest gave you, "expected to donate great sums to the cause. So you can forgive my choice of attire." One of the doormen hands you a black eye mask, which you put on, reserved no doubt for exceptional circumstances such as this. Once inside the casino, you debate your best bet for finding the Queen.
